steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 35-2009. A 60-year-old 
male renal-transplant recipient with renal insufficiency, diabetic ketoacidosis, 
and mental-status changes.
Baden LR(1), Digumarthy SR, Guimaraes AS, Branda JA.

Author information:
(1)Division of Infectious Disease, Brigham and Women's Hospital, USA.
